column4: can someone help me set up my screen resolution .. for some reason the only option is 640x480 ... i want to set it to 1240x68 .. i have ubuntu 5.0
hi can someone help me out setting up screen resolution ... im running hoarty ... have an onboard videocard i810 driver
it seems it only runs on 640x480 =(
do you use the correct driver?
and add "800x600" or "1024x768" before the other values for every display mode
i tried but it still doesnt work
if not, logout, at the login screen press ctrl+alt+del, login again (the screen is supposed to go black for short)
joshua: do you have the permission to do so?
hmm, googling for the gpu returns problems?
